title: What is true of system when net force is zero

content.question: The sum of all the external forces on a system of particles is zero. Which of the following must be true of the system?

choices.label: The total mechanical energy is constant.
The total potential energy is constant.
The total kinetic energy is constant.
The total linear momentum is constant.

content.answer: The total linear momentum is constant.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
